html:
6.8.20  12:54 am   does it make any damn difference what anyone does, if the entire universe is greater than we could ever comprehend

      the greater the universe, the greater the difference you can make

6.8.20  12:28 am   Opinions on America?

      sounds fictional

6.7.20  11:53 pm   Are you planning to frolic again any time soon?

      looking to get into a permanent state of frolic

6.7.20  11:47 pm   Opinion on the Pythagorean theorem?

      classic

6.7.20  10:16 pm   What is the coolest sound?

      clank

6.7.20  10:04 pm   what is your favourite music genre

      regular

6.7.20  9:51 pm   How do i stop being lazy

      be twice as lazy, and you will get tired of it much sooner

6.7.20  8:53 pm   what type of normal music do you listen to?

      average

6.7.20  8:42 pm   Hey! I'm a huge fan, and I know you have a bunch of fans, but still. I was gonna ask how you make your songs. I'm writing a book, which isn't the same thing as a song, but I wanna learn from the master himself.

      it's all about the run through. pretty much the only time you will ever know what the piece really can do, is when it is experienced in real time from the beginning, preferably after not having heard/seen it recently. i realize this creates time a time/scheduling paradox, but that is the nature of the business

6.7.20  8:21 pm   how can i dance

      escape from the wrong position. every position is wrong, which makes it a fun chase

6.7.20  8:19 pm   Japanese toilets, myth or facts/fax? 

      Japan is where myth and facts merge, in matters of business and pleasure, which i should mention also merge

6.7.20  8:05 pm   what is your opinion on bees

      imagine a normal bug, turned up to 11

6.7.20  7:54 pm   do you have a big inspiration or do you inspire yourself?

      everything is inspiration. inspiration is another name for a molecule

6.7.20  7:36 pm   What are your opinions on the world right now?

      seems to be even more round than i had previously realized

6.7.20  7:24 pm   Have you ever considered the fact that, in certain fonts, a q is just a backwards p?

      yes

6.7.20  7:23 pm   Do you think Joe Biden crumples or folds his toilet paper?

      assuming he gets it pre folded

6.7.20  7:09 pm   Hey, what's the name of this game? How do you play it? And how long does it take? How many times is the game going to change?

      as many times as you play

6.7.20  6:47 pm   what is your opinion of jam on toast

      sometimes i wonder how they got all that toast under the jam

6.7.20  6:28 pm   Opinion on life?

      it's what makes opinions possible

6.7.20  6:01 pm   How many hours of sleep are you supposed to get?

      maybe like 8 per day

6.7.20  5:51 pm   Opinion on philosophy?

      i'll have to think about it

6.7.20  5:47 pm   How do you come up with lyrical gold such as "ice butter"

     that's not a lyric, that seems like a visual caption

      and "o"?

     that's not a lyric, that sounds like a melody

6.7.20  5:40 pm   Can you tell me a bedtime story?

      once upon a time, this is exactly where you left off yesterday

6.7.20  5:39 pm   Opinion on life and its meaning?

      typical

6.7.20  5:30 pm   Thoughts on coconuts?

      the thing that really blows me away is their size

6.7.20  5:23 pm   Opinion on Photosynthesis?

      could come in handy

6.7.20  5:07 pm   Opinion on the future? 

      never heard of it

6.7.20  5:03 pm   Can I float in space without rocket boots?

      you will need a full body boot. rockets only necessary if you want to go somewhere

6.7.20  5:02 pm   How do I become one with the clouds?

      go out into the rain

6.7.20  4:58 pm   How u so funny

      to put it in terms of Geometry, i have discovered the Wrong Angle

6.7.20  4:52 pm   How long does it usually take for you to write a song?

      can get it done in a day, especially if i want it to be good

6.7.20  4:43 pm   What's the most normal thing a normal human being can possibly normally do?

      change their mind

6.7.20  4:43 pm   Are your any of your songs connected in any way?

     same artist

      I like to think they all take place in one big wacky universe.

      it's an average universe, of average size and type

6.7.20  4:42 pm   Would you say your a normal human being?

      might sing it

6.7.20  4:34 pm   How do you be normal?

      impossible. it can't be done

6.7.20  4:33 pm   will you do another H3 podcast?

      sure

6.7.20  4:21 pm   if you could time travel, when would you go?

      now, at a forward pace. that's just what's happening

6.7.20  4:19 pm   When I get older is such a special song. I love the lyrics I'm particular. Is there any insight you can offer into what inspired the song or any part of it?

     the first stanza must have been inspired by the planet i live on. and the rest of the song, when it came time, must have been inspired by the first stanza

      Or how you feel about it now?

     pretty good

6.7.20  4:19 pm   whats your favorite joke?

      'truth', and 'facts'

6.7.20  4:14 pm   have you ever considered professional basketball as a career opportunity

      maybe for about 5 minutes

6.7.20  4:01 pm   What are your thoughts on salami?

      i assume it's legal

6.7.20  3:52 pm   how to become a speed demon or utilize a speed demon? For travel purposes specifically. 

      first thing, this is just a precautionary item, but you must learn about time zones

6.7.20  3:50 pm   Will you please just release some new non-questions page-related content right away?!

      that's exactly what i'm going to do, how did you manage to predict the future

6.7.20  3:19 pm   How do you get motivated?

      not necessary. already am

6.7.20  3:07 pm   what do you think about 2020 so far?

      i am still trying to collect my thoughts

6.7.20  2:35 pm   Thoughts on raisins?

      very good if you've never heard of chocolate

6.7.20  2:17 pm   What are you doing right now?

      being extremely normal and regular

6.7.20  2:11 pm   What inspires your aesthetic

      survival

6.7.20  2:02 pm   what are your inspirations

      could be you

6.7.20  1:53 pm   What are your opinions on rap music?

      rap is everywhere in music
